mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission (code, name, resource, action, description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{code}, #{name}, #{resource}, #{action}, #{description}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE permission SET name = #{name}, resource = #{resource}, action = #{action}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.code, p.name, p.resource, p.action, p.description, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY p.id ASC
